description:
About the Company:

Onward Search is a specialized staffing and talent solutions company that helps professionals find top jobs with the nation’s leading brands. We’re looking to hire a Content Architect Contractor for a dynamic tech-driven company. Join us to lead the transformation of content architecture and drive innovation. You’ll join the Learning Enablement team to analyze and enhance our content structure to align with evolving technology and business needs. This is a 7-12 month opportunity. The role is located in Los Angeles, and is hybrid.


About the Role:

Content Architect Contractor Responsibilities:



  • Assess and analyze the existing content architecture, including structure, categorization, and content flow.
  • Research and evaluate the impact of AFSG and CG enterprise technology on content architecture.
  • Identify risks and impacts of current and future technology systems and tools such as AI, contextual help, Adobe, Acrolinx, and Coveo.
  • Develop and present comprehensive recommendations for optimizing content architecture.


Content Architect Contractor Requirements:


  • Strong understanding of content management systems, user experience design, search engine best practices, and AI.
  • Proven analytical skills with experience in evaluating complex content structures and technology.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
  • Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment.


Perks & Benefits:

  • Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance
  • Life Insurance
  • 401k Program
  • Commuter Benefit
  • eLearning
  • Education Reimbursement
  • Ongoing Training & Development


Equal Opportunity Statement: Include a statement on commitment to diversity and inclusivity.
